results.name: Irregular triangle T read by rows in which row n is the result of iterating the function S defined in A257480 and terminating at the first occurrence of 1, assuming the 3x+1 (or Collatz) conjecture.
mathematica: v[n_] := IntegerExponent[n, 2]; f[x_] := (3*x + 1)/2^v[3*x + 1]; s[n_] := (3 + (3/2)^v[1 + f[4*n - 3]]*(1 + f[4*n - 3]))/6; t[n_] := NestWhileList[s[#] &, n, # > 1 &]; Flatten[Table[t[n], {n, 15}]] (* Replace Flatten with Grid to get the irregular triangle. *)
xref: Cf. A257480 and cross references therein.
results.author: _L. Edson Jeffery_, May 02 2015
